abilities.berserk: Transforms into a powerful unit when combined with Mardroeme. Requires setup and timing to maximize effect.
abilities.bitingFrost: Reduces the strength of all close combat units to 1. A powerful weather card to weaken enemy frontlines.
abilities.clearWeather: Removes all active weather effects. Best used to restore your units‚Äô full strength.
abilities.commanderOfTheRedRiders: Leader ability to use Scorch effect immediately. A powerful board control tool to eliminate high-value enemy units.
abilities.decoy: Replaces a unit card on the battlefield and returns that card to your hand. Ideal for reusing spies or medics.
abilities.hero: Immune to all special cards and abilities. Cannot be affected by Scorch, weather, or other abilities. A powerful standalone card.
abilities.hisImperialMajesty: Leader ability allowing you to look at 3 random cards from your opponent‚Äôs hand. Gives insight and strategic planning.
abilities.horn: Doubles the strength of all units in the row it‚Äôs placed on (except heroes). Great for boosting your power in a single line.
abilities.impenetrableFog: Reduces the strength of all ranged units to 1. Best used when your opponent relies on mid-range units.
abilities.kingOfTemeria: Leader ability that draws an extra card when the round begins. Ensures card advantage.
abilities.mardroeme: Allows transformation of berserker units into their bear form. Used strategically with berserk units for increased strength.
abilities.medic: When played, allows you to bring back one unit card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Cannot revive hero or other medic cards.
abilities.moraleBoost: Increases the strength of all other units in its row by 1 point. It does not affect itself. Ideal for boosting large groups.
abilities.muster: Summons all cards with the same name from your deck to the battlefield. Quickly strengthens your field with matching units.
abilities.purebloodElf: Unaffected by weather. Combines well with weather-heavy decks to maintain strength.
abilities.scorch: Destroys the strongest non-hero units on the battlefield, including both your side and your opponent‚Äôs if tied. Great counter to high-power units.
abilities.skelligeStorm: Affects multiple rows simultaneously, reducing unit strength in both ranged and siege rows to 1.
abilities.spy: Played on the opponent‚Äôs side of the battlefield but grants you two extra cards. A smart trade-off of points for card advantage.
abilities.tightBond: Doubles the strength of all cards with the same name when placed next to each other. Best used in multiples for exponential power.
abilities.torrentialRain: Reduces the strength of all siege units to 1. Can cripple siege-heavy strategies.

errors.invalidNickname: Nickname can only contain Latin letters and numbers
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
errors.requiredFields: All required fields must be filled

footer.advertisement: Join the battle in Gwent! Build your deck and outsmart your opponents today!

text.1: Gwent is a strategic card game set in the Witcher universe where players battle by building decks and outsmarting their opponents.
text.10: The Gwent team regularly updates the game with balance patches, seasonal modes, and new card drops to keep gameplay fresh.
text.2: You can download Gwent for free on PC, iOS, Android, and select consoles, then create an account to start playing.
text.3: Yes, Gwent is completely free to play with optional in-game purchases for cosmetics and card kegs.
text.4: No, Gwent can be fully enjoyed without prior knowledge of the Witcher books or games, though fans may appreciate the lore references.
text.5: Building a strong deck requires balancing unit strength, special abilities, and synergies between your chosen faction's cards.
text.6: Factions represent different kingdoms and groups, such as Nilfgaard, Northern Realms, Scoia‚Äôtael, Monsters, and Skellige, each with unique playstyles.
text.7: Yes, Gwent offers friendly matches where you can challenge your friends directly.
text.8: Absolutely! Gwent hosts ranked seasons, official esports tournaments, and community-driven competitions.
text.9: While the main Gwent game is multiplayer-focused, there is a single-player experience called Gwent: Thronebreaker.

title.10: How often does Gwent receive updates and new cards?

monsters.description: Terrifying creatures that thrive in chaos and devour everything in their path. They can multiply, strengthen by consuming allies, and control the weather.
monsters.title: Monsters

nilfgaard.description: An empire that relies on spies, deceit, and controlling the opponent. Their forces reveal enemy cards and use strategic advantages.
nilfgaard.title: Nilfgaard

northern.description: Disciplined warriors who rely on knights, mages, and war machines. They gain bonuses from battlefield resilience and have many armored units.
northern.title: Northern Realms

scoiatael.description: Guerrilla elves, dwarves, and dryads waging war against human tyranny. They use trickery, ambushes, and unique placement mechanics.
scoiatael.title: Scoia'tael

html.aboutUs:
Oleksii Holodniak

A student of Uzhhorod National University, majoring in Software Engineering.

This page is part of a thesis project titled:

‚ÄúDevelopment of a Platform for Playing Gwent Based on the WebSocket Protocol‚Äù

Project Goal: To create a functional real-time gaming platform using modern web technologies that ensure high data transfer speed and scalability. Special attention is given to researching the WebSocket protocol and its advantages for online games.


Implemented in the thesis:

  • Full client-server interaction using WebSocket;
  • Game logic and rules adapted for an online environment;
  • System for player registration and connection;
  • Mechanism for creating and hosting game sessions;
  • Game state persistence and real-time updates.

Technologies used: WebSocket, React, Node.js, Express, TypeScript, Styled Components.
html.rules:
Game Rules: Gwent

Gwent is a strategic card game where two players battle using custom-built decks, aiming to win two out of three rounds by scoring more points than their opponent.

Objective: The goal is to win rounds by playing cards that add up to a higher total score than your opponent.

Deck Composition:

  • Each player‚Äôs deck contains a minimum of 25 cards.
  • Decks include unit cards (with strength values), special cards (weather, spells), and leader cards (with unique abilities).
  • Cards are divided among three rows: Melee, Ranged, and Siege.

Game Setup:

  • Players draw 10 random cards at the beginning of the game.
  • No additional cards are drawn between rounds, so strategic planning is crucial.

Gameplay:

  • The game is played in 3 rounds. A player needs to win 2 out of 3 rounds to win the match.
  • Each player plays one card per turn or passes.
  • The round ends when both players pass consecutively.
  • The player with the highest total strength on the battlefield wins the round.

Passing:

  • You may pass your turn at any time to preserve cards for future rounds.
  • Once passed, you cannot play further cards for that round.

Card Effects:

  • Unit Cards: Contribute strength to a row.
  • Special Cards: Modify game state (e.g., clear weather, double strength).
  • Weather Cards: Reduce the strength of all cards on a particular row.

Victory: To win, carefully manage your resources, outmaneuver your opponent across all rounds, and use each card to its maximum potential.

Strategy Tips:

  • Don‚Äôt use all strong cards in the first round‚Äîbalance power across rounds.
  • Bait out your opponent‚Äôs powerful cards early.
  • Know when to pass and save resources for a decisive round.
  • Build synergy within your deck‚Äîcards that work well together often win games.

descriptions.one: is a card game where victory depends not on luck, but on your skill. Choose a faction, build your army, and challenge players worldwide in various game modes. Adapt your strategies on the fly with hundreds of unique cards featuring charismatic heroes, powerful spells, and special abilities. Remember: every move you make shapes the outcome of the battle.
descriptions.two: Master the art of deck-building, outsmart your opponents, and climb the ranks to become a true GWENT champion!

mode.one: Engage in thrilling duels using a real-time WebSocket connection. Challenge friends or face off against skilled opponents in a seamless online experience.
mode.two: Test your tactics in Duel Mode, where every decision matters. Adapt your strategy, predict your rival‚Äôs moves, and fight for victory!

start.one: Sign up, build your first deck, and dive into battle!
start.two: Challenge a friend or match with a worthy opponent to prove your skills!

properly.one: In Gwent, it‚Äôs not just about playing strong cards but also about assessing the battlefield correctly. Every move matters, and rushed decisions can cost you the game. Finding the right balance between attacking and controlling your opponent is crucial, as is knowing when to concede a round to gain an advantage later. Keeping track of resources, predicting your opponent‚Äôs strategy, and playing cards based on synergy rather than just raw power will lead to victory. Success comes to those who think ahead and force their opponent to play on their terms.
properly.two: Understanding the tempo of the game allows you to dictate the flow and force your opponent into bad moves.It‚Äôs crucial not only to know your own cards but also to anticipate possible threats from your opponent. Sometimes, it's best to intentionally lose a round to secure a stronger position in the decisive one. The winner is the one who doesn‚Äôt just play cards but builds a strategy several steps ahead.

subTitle.advertisement: The free card game set in The Witcher universe, where players build decks and battle strategically.
subTitle.cards: Step into a world where every card is a key to thrilling stories and unmatched strategy. Experience the exquisite artistry and creativity woven into every detail. Welcome to our incredible collection of Gwent cards from The Witcher 3!
subTitle.fractions: Factions in Gwent have unique playstyles and mechanics. Some rely on strength, others on cunning or chaos.

Adapt your strategies on the fly with hundreds of unique cards featuring charismatic heroes, powerful spells, and special abilities. Remember: every move you make shapes the outcome of the battle.
